name: Sword of Windfury
description: A sword imbued with the essence of wind, the enchanter made a pact with the elements of the air itself. It floats beside you, ready to strike.
tooltip: You gain 10% critical chance while wielding this weapon.
You gain 10% magic resistance while wielding this weapon.
You take 15% less wind damage while wielding this weapon.
You gain +5 accuracy while wielding this weapon.
You gain +10 magic accuracy while wielding this weapon.
Gale Force (60%): Deals 2-8 + 5 * CHA or INT bonus slashing damage and 2-12 + 5 * CHA bonus wind damage.
Wind Shear (30%): Deals 2-8 + 5 * CHA or INT bonus slashing damage and 2-12 + 5 * CHA bonus wind damage.
The Name of the Wind (10%): Deals 2-12 + 5 * CHA or INT bonus slashing damage and 3-24 + 5 * CHA bonus wind damage. This attack has +5 accuracy and +10 magic accuracy.
